text: Not sure if this is the right channel for this. Is it possible to have one landing page reside on a different domain? Lets say my current site exists on <http://example.com|example.com>, but I have one landing page in my site that I want to exist on <http://cool-example.com|cool-example.com>. Does HubSpot allow that? I've tried searching and come up with nothing so far.
